record.title: RECESS UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
RECESS UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - September 17, 2008)

[Page: S8961]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand in recess under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:46 p.m, recessed until Thursday, September 18, 2008, at 10 a.m.
